doc.title: Il giardino dei trifogli
doc.plot: Philip, since childhood, is looking to find the four leaved clover and with it the meaning of its mysterious fourth leaf... Will he find them?! A short film that explores some important aspects of human life, like family, love, fortune. One of its themes is the need for discovering new things and the continuous strive for improvement that distinguish the human beings, a search that some times can become exasperated... or to be transformed to a chase of idealized, nonexistent situations.
